text:
ðŸ‡½ðŸ‡° Kosovo: RTK Broadcasting the Eurovision Song Contest 2021
RTK the national broadcaster of Kosovo will be broadcasting the Eurovision Song Contest 2021 live.
The Kosovar national broadcaster will once again be broadcasting the Eurovision Song Contest to viewers across the country. RTK has been broadcasting the Eurovision Song Contest live for viewers in the country for over a decade.
Other non-competing nations that are broadcasting the contest include:
Canada â€“ OMNI Television
Kazakhstan â€“ Khabar Agency
Slovakia â€“ Radio_FM
In the past, Kosovo has participated in other Eurovision events. For example in 2011, RTK selected Tringa Hsya to participate in the Eurovision Young Dancers contest that year.
To be able to participate in a future edition of the Song Contest, Kosovo must become a member of the International Television Union, as well as a member of the United Nations.
Image Source: Eurovision Spain | Source: Eurovision Kosovo
